Class SpawnManager

java.lang.Object
game.managers.SpawnManager
public class SpawnManager extends Object
Manages the spawning of game entities (obstacles, items, platforms). Controls spawn timing, probabilities, and difficulty scaling.

Spawn distribution:

  • 25% - Ground obstacles (Bomb/Fire)
  • 30% - Layer 2 platforms (Y=350) with entities
  • 20% - Layer 3 platforms (Y=200) with entities
  • 25% - Ground items

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(double dt, List<Obstacle> obstacles, List<Item> items, List<Platform> platforms)
      Updates the spawn timer and triggers spawns when appropriate.
      Parameters:
      dt - delta time in seconds (adjusted for speed multiplier)
      obstacles - list to add spawned obstacles
      items - list to add spawned items
      platforms - list to add spawned platforms

    • spawnEntity

      private void spawnEntity(List<Obstacle> obstacles, List<Item> items, List<Platform> platforms)
      Spawns a random entity based on probability distribution (matching original logic).
      Parameters:
      obstacles - list to add obstacles
      items - list to add items
      platforms - list to add platforms

    • spawnRandomEntity

      private void spawnRandomEntity(double x, double y, boolean onPlatform, List<Obstacle> obstacles, List<Item> items)
      Spawns a random entity (item or obstacle) at the specified position. This matches the original spawnRandomEntity logic from GameScreen.
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate
      y - y-coordinate
      onPlatform - whether entity is on a platform
      obstacles - list to add obstacles
      items - list to add items

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the spawn timer.

      public double getTimeSinceLastSpawn()

      time in seconds
